title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, models, admin) packaged as a Docker container.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI wrapper with chat history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style autocomplete.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await and System.Text.Json serialization.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and embeddings.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda Connectors that invoke Ollama for human-task summarization and email drafting.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Scripts to convert and upload Hugging Face models into Ollama Modelfile format.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama allowing declarative installs and model definitions.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that proxies channel messages to Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component and demo app for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your vault notes.
